languages.text: {n}Лицо Соломона непроницаемо. Он сверлит взглядом инфопластину в ваших руках. Наконец он с удивительной мягкостью произносит:{/n} "Полагаю, вы желаете объяснений".

traits.locale_text: Пристально смотрит на книжечку. Итак, вы наверное ждете объяснений

languages.text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Соломона непроницаемо. Он сверлит взглядом инфопластину в ваших руках. Наконец он с удивительной мягкостью произносит:{/n} "Полагаю, вы желаете объяснений".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの表情は何も語らなかった。彼の視線は、あなたの手にあるデータスレートを貫くように見つめている。やがて、意外なほど穏やかな口調で、彼は口を開いた。{/n}「説明が欲しいのでしょうね」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの表情は何も語らなかった。彼の視線は、あなたの手にあるデータスレートを貫くように見つめている。やがて、意外なほど穏やかな口調で、彼は口を開いた。{/n}「説明が欲しいのでしょうね」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Miene verrät nichts. Er starrt auf den Datablock in deinen Händen. Schließlich spricht er, und sein Ton ist überraschend sanft:{/n} "Ich nehme an, Ihr möchtet eine Erklärung."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Miene verrät nichts. Er starrt auf den Datablock in deinen Händen. Schließlich spricht er, und sein Ton ist überraschend sanft:{/n} "Ich nehme an, Ihr möchtet eine Erklärung."

languages.text: {n}Le visage impassible de Solomorne ne trahit pas la moindre émotion. Ses yeux sont rivés sur la plaque de données que vous tenez entre vos mains. Au bout d'un moment, il se décide enfin à parler, d'un ton dont la douceur vous étonne :{/n} « J'imagine que vous attendez une explication. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage impassible de Solomorne ne trahit pas la moindre émotion. Ses yeux sont rivés sur la plaque de données que vous tenez entre vos mains. Au bout d'un moment, il se décide enfin à parler, d'un ton dont la douceur vous étonne :{/n} « J'imagine que vous attendez une explication. »

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Solomorne no delata emoción alguna; tiene la vista clavada en la tablilla de datos que sostienes. Finalmente, habla con un tono de voz sorprendentemente delicado:{/n} «Supongo que querrá una explicación».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Solomorne no delata emoción alguna; tiene la vista clavada en la tablilla de datos que sostienes. Finalmente, habla con un tono de voz sorprendentemente delicado:{/n} «Supongo que querrá una explicación».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸上没有露出任何感情，他的目光紧紧盯着你手中的数据板。到最后，他开了口，语气出人意料地温和。{/n}“我猜测，你或许希望我能解释一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸上没有露出任何感情，他的目光紧紧盯着你手中的数据板。到最后，他开了口，语气出人意料地温和。{/n}“我猜测，你或许希望我能解释一下。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un çehresi, tek bir duyguyu bile ele vermiyor. Gözleri, elindeki databelaya âdeta delip geçecekmişçesine saplanmış vaziyette. Nihayet nazik ses tonuyla söze başlıyor.{/n} "Herhâlde bir izahat arzu ediyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un çehresi tek bir duyguyu bile ele vermiyordu. Gözleri, elindeki databelaya âdeta delip geçecekmişçesine saplanmıştı. Nihayet şaşırtıcı bir nazik ses tonuyla söze başladı:{/n} "Herhâlde bir izahat arzu ediyorsunuz."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face gives nothing away. His eyes bore into the data-slate in your hands. At last, he speaks, his tone surprisingly gentle:{/n} "I imagine you want an explanation."
